extension.news: [COLOR lavender][B]Insert/Swap Kodi Favourites[/B][/COLOR] [B]1.2:[/B] - Add ability to change the Thumbnail size settings. [B]1.1:[/B] - Add ability to change the label Font size settings. [B]1.0:[/B] - Initial release with configuration option to set to swap or insert.
extension.description:
Lets you reorder the entries in your [B]Favourites[/B] by either "swapping" or "inserting".
Select "A" then "B" Swap: "A" will be placed where "B" is and vice versa. Insert: "A" will be placed in front/after "B" in the list.
Set this option in the configuration screen.
Use this to quickly and easily organize your Favourites.
